entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Quinte West
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:03 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 12:03 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
